title.native: 聖剣使いの禁呪詠唱＜ワールドブレイク＞
title.english: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman

description:
The story is set in a private high school that brings together "saviors," youths with awakened memories from past lives. Some of them are Shirogane who fight enemies with weapons and techniques gleaned from the Puraana powers from their own bodies. Others are Kuroma who wipe out enemies, with magic to manipulate the Maana powers that surpass physics. A boy named Moroha Haimura enrolls in this school. He is the first person in history with past lives of both Shirogane and Kuroma.

(Source: Anime News Network)
synonyms: World Break เทพนักดาบข้ามภพ

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Kaiju
tags.description: Prominently features giant monsters.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Archery
tags.description: Centers around the sport of archery, or prominently features the use of archery in combat.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yamayama800) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/山口宏_(脚本家%29)

He's Japanese screenwriter and novelist, and one of the founders of Studio [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO).

[Website](https://www.universal-music.co.jp/petit-milady/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/petitmilady) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXMlgSrADF3FEkbW5CEHj8g)

__Members:__ [Aoi Yuuki](https://anilist.co/staff/101686) & [Ayana Taketatsu](https://anilist.co/staff/101996)

A voice actress duo unit. Together, they have performed the opening and ending themes for various anime, including the song "Kagami no Dual-ism", which was used as the third opening theme to [Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal II](https://anilist.co/anime/15489/), the song "Azurite", which was used as the opening theme for [The Pilot's Love Song](https://anilist.co/anime/19117/), the song "Seishun wa Tabemono desu", used as the opening theme for [Pan de Peace](https://anilist.co/anime/21315/), the song "A or A!?", used as the opening theme for [Alice or Alice](https://anilist.co/anime/99638/).

The name of the unit is a reference to the fact that Aoi Yuuki and Ayana Taketatsu are small (their heights are 144.5 and 151 cm respectively) and cute girls.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sizuk_official) | [Bio](https://sizuk.co.jp/artists/shunryu/) Shunryuu is a Japanese composer affiliated with Sizuk Entertainment.
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sizuk_official) | [Bio](https://sizuk.co.jp/artists/shunryu/) Shunryuu is a Japanese composer affiliated with Sizuk Entertainment.
__Mikiya Katakura__ is the keyboardist, composer and arranger of the duo [ALI PROJECT](https://anilist.co/staff/100631).
__Mikiya Katakura__ is the keyboardist, composer and arranger of the duo [ALI PROJECT](https://anilist.co/staff/100631).

The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"
ADR Script worker affiliated with Funimation.
Tyler Walker is an ADR Director, Script writer and voice actor for FUNimation.

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.
